com.hadoop.mapreduce

Class LzoLineRecordReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.RecordReader<org.apache.hadoop.io.LongWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.Text>
      • com.hadoop.mapreduce.LzoLineRecordReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class LzoLineRecordReader
extends org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.RecordReader<org.apache.hadoop.io.LongWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.Text>
    Reads line from an lzo compressed text file. Treats keys as offset in file and value as line.
